data.title: Schaltbau on LinkedIn: Schaltbau supports the Silicon Vilstal Adventure Festival 2023 as a sponsor
data.meta_description:
🌟Experience the Silicon Vilstal Festival from Sep. 21 to 24, 2023🌟

The Silicon Vilstal, will take place this year under the motto "Everything flows" in…
data.text:
Q: What do autonomous vehicles, lithium-ion batteries, and IoT sensors have in common? A: Connectors! Specifically, in intralogistics, connectors are driving innovation by integrating new technologies into existing systems – helping your operations become more efficient and reliable. Learn more about how connectors are there every step of the way for future intralogistics trends on our corporate blog. Read here: https://ow.ly/VUFH50SHSzW #Schaltbau #Intralogistics #Connectors #Eddicy

#B2Run 2024: Unleash creativity through teamwork! At the #B2Run, we not only put our fitness to the test, but also experienced how team spirit and collaboration inspire our creativity! 🚀💡 When we work together as a team, the best ideas and most innovative solutions emerge. 🏃♂️🏃♀️ Running together, growing together - team building not only strengthens our cohesion, but also helps us get ahead in our day-to-day work. Through teamwork, we develop creative approaches that help us to master challenges in new and exciting ways. 💪🤝 Would you like to find out more about our corporate values and our dedicated team? Visit us at https://lnkd.in/eCqe-hjZ!

We are thrilled to announce our participation at #InnoTrans2024! Join us from September 24-27 at Messe Berlin, where we'll present new products to increase the safety and efficiency of the railway industry. What to expect: ✔️Next-generation high-power rail contactors: explore the cutting-edge CP and CF series, including a first look at our intelligent prototype ✔️Advanced electrification solutions: discover the new PAD 41 emergency brake handle and a new snap-action switch. ✔️Intelligent rail interfaces: experience master control systems and driver desks for intuitive, safe rail interaction with our brand SPII S.p.A. 📍 Where to find us: Hall 2.2b, Stand 110 Our team of experts will be on hand to provide in-depth demonstrations and answer all your questions. Read more here: https://lnkd.in/eip6sJvX #Schaltbau #ChampioningSafetyonRail #RailInnovation #TransportTech #InnoTrans2024 #RailIndustry #Technology #MobilitySolutions

From autonomous vehicles to IoT sensors, the landscape of intralogistics is evolving rapidly. These innovations promise efficiency, safety, and sustainability gains, but their seamless integration poses unique challenges. Enter connectors: the hidden gems of intralogistics, these small yet powerful components are facilitating the adoption of technologies like lithium-ion batteries, digital twins, and AI-driven optimization. They ensure the smooth transfer of power, data, and control signals essential for AGVs, conveyor systems, and more. At Schaltbau, we understand the pivotal role connectors play in integrating these technological advancements to meet customer needs. Learn more about the transformative impact of connectors in intralogistics on our corporate blog. ➡ Read now: https://lnkd.in/gX5aZuej #Eddicy #Intralogistics #Connectors #DigitalTransformation #AI #IoT

Are you curious about the evolving landscape of connectors in the era of electric vehicles and advanced intralogistics systems? We've got you covered. As electric vehicles and lithium-ion batteries gain traction, the demand for reliable and safe connectors is at an all-time high. Learn how frequent intermediate charging has transformed user expectations and introduced new connector requirements. Discover the latest advancements in connector properties and production, and their implications for the intralogistics sector and beyond. Whether you're in manufacturing, logistics, or simply curious about connector technology, this session is essential for staying informed. Don't miss your chance to stay ahead in connector technology. Register now to secure your spot! 👉 Thursday, July 18th, 5:00PM (CEST) 👉 Register here: https://lnkd.in/eukiJdNM #Eddicy #UnlocktheFullDCPotential #Emobility #Intralogistics

🚢📢 We’re pleased to announce that our C320 contactor series has received DNV approval for maritime applications – signifying that our Eddicy solution meets the highest standards for performance and reliability in maritime applications, including commercial shipping, offshore platforms, and other marine vessels. The C320 contactor series at a glance: ✅ Compact yet high-powered design. ✅Rated short-circuit making capacity of up to 3,000 amps. ✅ Continuous conduction of up to 1,000 amps with minimal heating. ✅ Ability to handle short circuits up to 4,500 amps for 100 milliseconds without contact welding. ✅ Efficient ceramic arc chamber and generous air gaps for reliable performance. The C320 joins our C360 single-pole AC and bidirectional DC contactor series, which is also DNV certified. ➡ Read more here: https://lnkd.in/e3T3zyej #Schaltbau #Eddicy #DNV #MaritimeSafety #MaritimeTechnology #EddicyC320

DC contactors play a crucial role in enhancing the performance and durability of energy storage systems by enabling efficient energy management and safeguarding against electrical faults. Our recent success story exemplifies our commitment to ensuring the highest availability and safety in energy storage solutions for our customers. Learn more about our proven solutions for superior energy management and protection. Dive into our success story now! #Eddicy #UnlocktheFullDCPotential #Energy #EnergyStorage

Diversity fuels innovation, leading to better solutions and a brighter future for all! At Schaltbau, we think that’s something to celebrate. 👩🔧🙌 When individuals from varied backgrounds come together, they bring a wealth of ideas and viewpoints that drive creativity and problem-solving. This blend of experience is crucial for developing innovative products and services that meet the needs of a diverse customer base. Veronika, Grete, and Carina – three women in STEM at Schaltbau – recently shared their experiences and perspectives in an article on our corporate blog. Check it out here: https://lnkd.in/eBmE35P3 #TeamSchaltbau #WomeninSTEM #Innovation

Electrification and automation are part and parcel of everyday operations of modern factories, warehouses and logistics centers. From automated guided vehicles (AGVs) to electric forklifts and battery-powered industrial trucks, sustainable solutions add to the economic bottom-line and benefit those who seek flexibility, zero emissions and noise reduction. Stay tuned to learn more about how Schaltbau connectors are driving innovation in intralogistics. And don't forget to check out our upcoming webinar: 👉 Thursday, July 18th, 5:00PM (CEST) 👉 Register here: https://lnkd.in/eukiJdNM #Eddicy #UnlocktheFullDCPotential #E-mobility #Intralogistics

Happy International Women in Engineering Day! 🎉 Despite making up half of the global population, women are significantly underrepresented in engineering fields, with only about 15% of engineers being female in many countries. Yesterday was International Women in Engineering Day and on this occasion, we’d like to celebrate our diverse and talented workforce by highlighting a few inspiring female talents at Schaltbau. Veronika, Grete, and Carina share their experience and perspectives over on our corporate blog. We hope this encourages more women to enter and thrive in engineering careers, ensuring a richer, more dynamic, and ultimately more successful engineering landscape, capable of meeting the challenges of the future. 👩🔧 Read here: https://lnkd.in/eBmE35P3 #INWED24 #TeamSchaltbau #WomenInEngineering #WomenInIndustry
